_title_display: Practical cabinet maker and furniture designer's assistant : with essays on history of furniture, taste in design, color and materials, with full explanation of the canons of good taste in furniture together with many practical directions for making cabinet work generally, and a number of pieces of furniture in particular, along with hundreds of recipes for finishing, staining, varnishing, polishing and gilding of all kinds of cabinet work
_grp_contributor: Sterling and Francine Clark Art Institute. Library

title.value: Practical cabinet maker and furniture designer's assistant : with essays on history of furniture, taste in design, color and materials, with full explanation of the canons of good taste in furniture together with many practical directions for making cabinet work generally, and a number of pieces of furniture in particular, along with hundreds of recipes for finishing, staining, varnishing, polishing and gilding of all kinds of cabinet work

source.value: Electronic reproduction of (manifestation): Hodgson, Fred. T. (Frederick Thomas), 1836-1919. Hodgson ... illustrated with over 200 drawings and sketches. Chicago, F.J. Drake & co. [c1910]. 1 p. l., 9-372 p. front., illus. 20 cm. Call number of original: NK2270 H56
